about_the_game:
This expansion challenges you to a whole new level: only one chance, the defeat is not an option.

You cannot continue in case of defeat. This game mode is only for the bravest nerd.

This expansion also allows you to discover during any of your playthrough 3 new headgears, 3 new armors and 3 special weapons.
detailed_description:
This expansion challenges you to a whole new level: only one chance, the defeat is not an option.

You cannot continue in case of defeat. This game mode is only for the bravest nerd.

This expansion also allows you to discover during any of your playthrough 3 new headgears, 3 new armors and 3 special weapons.
name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Iron Nerds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 512 MB Ram
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8182 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 1024 MB Ram
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

short_description: Only one chance, only for the bravest. You cannot continue in case of defeat.
supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
